    • Uses of Pannable in in.tamchow.fractal.fractals.IFS

      Classes in in.tamchow.fractal.fractals.IFS that implement Pannable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IFSGenerator
      Generates IFS fractals Hack to support multithreading: Actually makes 2 passes: 1 in single threaded initialization phase without rendering to get starting points for threads (fast) & 1 in multithreaded mode for rendering/animation (slow)
